long_description: Introduce your kids to the water, then try and keep up. The highly functional Bending Branches Splash paddle will keep them paddling happily all day long. Shaft and blades are built proportionally for small hands, providing children with a comfortable, fun paddling experience that encourages them to continue in the sport. Fiberglass-reinforced polypropylene blades offer a light swing weight to reduce fatigue. Dihedral curve and asymmetrical power face eliminate blade flutter, and low-profile design reduces wind resistance. Blade surface area is distributed evenly for a balanced feel, uniform pull and minimal roll. Composite ferrule is extremely light and strong; tested to ensure great fit, feathering angle, breakdown ease and joint tightness. Feathering is adjustable to 0deg or 60deg with left or right hand control. Heavy-duty rubber drip rings help keep hands dry.
short_description: Introduce your kids to the water, then try and keep up. The highly functional Bending Branches Splash paddle will keep them paddling happily all day long.
